Weekly Digest

 

For Immediate Release

Contact: 

Judith Ingram

December 30, 2010

Julia Queen
  Christian Hilland
  Mary Brandenberger
   
 

ISSUE 2010-52

                       

Weekly Digest
Week of December 27 – 31

 

COMMISSION MEETINGS

No Commission Executive Sessions or Open Meetings were scheduled this week.

ENFORCEMENT

The Commission made public two closed cases.

MUR 6306 – Friends of Sharron Angle and Alan B. Mills, in his official capacity as treasurer; Sharron B. Angle; and DLR Ventures, LLC.  The Commission dismissed the case. Commissioner Steven T. Walther recused himself with respect to this matter and did not vote.

MUR 6351 – William J. Pascrell; and Pascrell for Congress and Edward Farmer, in his official capacity as treasurer. The Commission found no reason to believe the respondents violated the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971, as amended (the Act).

For more information, see the case documents in the Enforcement Query System.

LITIGATION

Schonberg v. FEC.  On December 23, the Commission filed a Motion to Dissolve Three-Judge Court in the United States District Court for the District of Columbia. On December 27, the plaintiff filed an Amended Complaint.

UPCOMING REPORTING DUE DATES

January 31:  Year-end Reports are due. For more information on reporting dates, click here.

UPCOMING EVENTS 

January 12, 2011, Washington, DC. FEC Roundtable Workshops on FEC Reporting Requirements. Registration information and schedule are here.

January 12, 2011, Washington, DC. FEC Roundtable Workshops on FECFile & E-Filing. Registration information and schedule are here.

OTHER RESOURCES

The December issue of The Record is here. Sign up here to receive email notification when a new issue of the Record is posted.

The December 2010 Supplements to the FEC’s Campaign Guides are here.

Sunshine Act Notices for previous Executive Sessions are here. Agendas and related documents for previous Open Meetings are here. Audio recordings for selected previous meetings, hearings and presentations are here.
